message.body: ï¿¼I asked my dad to take a pic now
You're just going to have to trust me:; they're not as pointy or weird looking as in the photo
They're actually totally normal pointy toed but not too pointy, pumps. He's bringing them to the city tom and if you want to try them on you can , no pressure
They were expensive so I promise they are nice quality and you can totally have them if they for you
*fit you. They're real leather. Off white
They sound perfect! Thank you so much! I'm working tomorrow night but perhaps I could meet up with you over the weekend? Thank you so much again!
They might not be white enough for you /they're kinda beige white so we will see, but yeah weekend sounds good!
I mean they are super cute shoes either way lol and if they fit you, then they're my wedding present to you lol
Aw, thank you lady! I think they could totally work. I'll see you soon! I'm looking forward to it:).
